title: The Straits Times
title_page: Lim Min Zhang | The Straits Times
maintext: Min Zhang joined The Straits Times in 2017 after reading philosophy at the National University of Singapore. He covered defence and politics before moving in June 2023 to Beijing, where he writes on a wide range of issues on China, including making sense of political and technology developments. Off work, most of his time is spent on drinking bubble tea and playing with electronic gadgets.
